title: Scott Stapp: When The Time Is Right, Creed Will Reunite [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 13 hours ago 2 
Scott Stapp was recently asked by Mitch Lafon whether the door for Creed reunion is completely shut, to which he replied: 
"No, the door is not shut. I think that when the time is right, there's always something in store. But like I said, when the time is right." 
Pressed to elaborate on when the time will be right, the singer noted: "I think when we feel it. We have stayed in communication - so when it just feels right and organic and natural..."The best way to describe it is how I said it - when the time is right. I think everyone in the band will just feel it inside."Creed have disbanded for the second time in 2012 and stayed inactive ever since. Their latest studio album, " Full Circle ," saw its release in October 2009 as the fourth effort in the band's catalog.
